column1: {{book

The '''''J.R.R. Tolkien Calendar 1994''''' was the official Tolkien calendar published by [[HarperCollins]] on [[12 July]] [[1993]]. It features art by [[Michael Kaluta]] based on ''[[The Lord of the Rings]]''.
__NOTOC__
